special_abilities.name: Siege Monster.
descriptions: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

special_abilities.name: Tackle.
descriptions: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
